scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development istanbul cover _mocha -- -R spec --recursive --watch-extensions js,jsx --compilers js:babel-core/register --require app/assets/javascript/tests/setup.js $(find app/assets/javascript/tests/ -name '*_test.jsx' && find app/assets/javascript/tests/ -name '*_test.js')
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=development mocha --no-deprecation --recursive --reporter spec --watch-extensions js,jsx --compilers js:babel-core/register --require app/assets/javascript/tests/setup.js $(find app/assets/javascript/tests/ -name '*_test.jsx' && find app/assets/javascript/tests/ -name '*_test.js')
scripts.test:watch: NODE_ENV=development mocha --no-deprecation --recursive --reporter spec --watch --watch-extensions js,jsx --compilers js:babel-core/register --require app/assets/javascript/tests/setup.js $(find app/assets/javascript/tests/ -name '*_test.jsx' && find app/assets/javascript/tests/ -name '*_test.js')
